name: Thales Alexandre F. Albuquerque
bio: I'm a medical student who programs as a hobby. I love python for it's elegance and readability; it was my first langauge and it remains my favorite.

name: Ian McCowan
link_text: writing and music and what not
bio: Python is the first language I taught myself, and the one I used at my first job. I love its relative accessibility to newcomers and the huge ecosystem you can grow into as you learn it!
